name: library-desktop
description: A desktop app for the library

author.name: El Chato Moreno y los otros

scripts.dev: concurrently "turbo dev -F api" "turbo dev -F db && turbo prisma -F api && turbo prisma:seed -F api && turbo dev -F client "
scripts.dev:windows: concurrently "turbo dev -F api" "turbo prisma -F api && turbo prisma:seed -F api && turbo dev -F client "
scripts.start: turbo start -F db && concurrently "turbo start -F api" "turbo prisma -F api && turbo prisma:seed -F api && turbo start -F client "
scripts.start:local: turbo start -F db && turbo start -F main-server && concurrently "turbo start -F api" "turbo prisma -F api && turbo prisma:seed -F api && turbo start -F client "
